bit_field_value.name: VERID_FEATURE_0b0000000000000010
bit_field_value.description: Master only with standard feature set.

bit_field_value.name: VERID_FEATURE_0b0000000000000011
bit_field_value.description: Master and slave with standard feature set.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_DOZEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Master is enabled in Doze mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_DOZEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Master is disabled in Doze mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_DBGEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Master is disabled in debug mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_DBGEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Master is enabled in debug mode.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_EPF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Master has not generated a STOP or Repeated START condition.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_EPF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Master has generated a STOP or Repeated START condition.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_SDF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Master has not generated a STOP condition.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_SDF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Master has generated a STOP condition.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_FEF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Master sending or receiving data without START condition.

bit_field_value.name: MSR_PLTF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Pin low timeout has not occurred or is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR0_HRSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Host request input is pin HREQ.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR0_HRSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Host request input is input trigger.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR0_RDMO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Received data is stored in the receive FIFO as normal.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR0_RDMO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Received data is discarded unless the RMF is set.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_AUTOSTOP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: STOP condition is automatically generated whenever the transmit FIFO is empty and LPI2C master is busy.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_IGNACK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C Master will receive ACK and NACK normally.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_IGNACK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C Master will treat a received NACK as if it was an ACK.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_TIMECFG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Pin Low Timeout Flag will set if SCL is low for longer than the configured timeout.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_TIMECFG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Pin Low Timeout Flag will set if either SCL or SDA is low for longer than the configured timeout.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b011
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 AND 2nd data word equals MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 AND next data word equals MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (1st data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_MATCFG_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Match enabled (any data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b000
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin open drain mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b001
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin output only mode (ultra-fast mode).

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b100
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin open drain mode with separate LPI2C slave.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b101
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin output only mode (ultra-fast mode) with separate LPI2C slave.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b110
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin push-pull mode with separate LPI2C slave.

bit_field_value.name: MCFGR1_PINCFG_0b111
bit_field_value.description: LPI2C configured for 4-pin push-pull mode (inverted outputs).

bit_field_value.name: MTDR_CMD_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0].

bit_field_value.name: MTDR_CMD_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0]. This transfer expects a NACK to be returned.

bit_field_value.name: MTDR_CMD_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0] using high speed mode.

bit_field_value.name: MTDR_CMD_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0] using high speed mode. This transfer expects a NACK to be returned.

bit_field_value.name: SCR_FILTEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable digital filter and output delay counter for slave mode.

bit_field_value.name: SCR_FILTEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable digital filter and output delay counter for slave mode.

bit_field_value.name: SCR_FILTDZ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Filter remains enabled in Doze mode.

bit_field_value.name: SCR_FILTDZ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Filter is disabled in Doze mode.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_AVF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Address Status Register is not valid.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_RSF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slave has not detected a Repeated START condition.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_RSF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slave has detected a Repeated START condition.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_SDF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slave has not detected a STOP condition.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_SDF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slave has detected a STOP condition.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_BEF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slave has not detected a bit error.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_BEF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slave has detected a bit error.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_FEF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FIFO underflow or overflow not detected.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_AM0F_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Have not received ADDR0 matching address.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_AM1F_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Have not received ADDR1 or ADDR0/ADDR1 range matching address.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_AM1F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Have received ADDR1 or ADDR0/ADDR1 range matching address.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_GCF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slave has not detected the General Call Address or General Call Address disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_GCF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slave has detected the General Call Address.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_SARF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: SMBus Alert Response disabled or not detected.

bit_field_value.name: SSR_SARF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: SMBus Alert Response enabled and detected.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_TXCFG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Transmit Data Flag will only assert during a slave-transmit transfer when the transmit data register is empty.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_TXCFG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Transmit Data Flag will assert whenever the transmit data register is empty.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_RXCFG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Reading the receive data register will return receive data and clear the receive data flag.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_RXCFG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Reading the receive data register when the address valid flag is set will return the address status register and clear the address valid flag. Reading the receive data register when the address valid flag is clear will return receive data and clear the receive data flag.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_IGNACK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Slave will end transfer when NACK detected.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_IGNACK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Slave will not end transfer when NACK detected.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_HSMEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disables detection of Hs-mode master code.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_HSMEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enables detection of Hs-mode master code.

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_ADDRCFG_0b110
bit_field_value.description: From Address match 0 (7-bit) to Address match 1 (7-bit).

bit_field_value.name: SCFGR1_ADDRCFG_0b111
bit_field_value.description: From Address match 0 (10-bit) to Address match 1 (10-bit).

bit_field_value.name: SRDR_RXEMPTY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The Receive Data Register is not empty.

bit_field_value.name: SRDR_RXEMPTY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The Receive Data Register is empty.

bit_field_value.name: SRDR_SOF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Indicates this is not the first data word since a (repeated) START or STOP condition.

bit_field_value.name: SRDR_SOF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Indicates this is the first data word since a (repeated) START or STOP condition.
